process.name: STS Agile Latest Copy for Zodiac
process.description: Created on 14/1/2020 for use to evaluate the Export/Import utility mentioned by Ather

fields.name: Original Estimate
fields.description: Initial value for Remaining Work - set once, when work begins

fields.name: Stack Rank
fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank. Set in triage.

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the feature

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the feature more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implement the feature

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = Services provided by the system to fulfill stakeholder needs; Architectural = Technical system services to implement business features that deliver solution value

fields.name: Due Date
fields.description: The date by which this issue needs to be closed

fields.name: Reference Documents PRD
fields.description: Separate each data element with ';' character. End each row with '|' character

fields.name: Not required in Traceability via link to Specification or Requirement
Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Not required in Traceability via link to Specification or Requirement

workItemTypes.name: Design Review Response
workItemTypes.description: Response for a design review request

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the task through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Review Request
workItemTypes.description: Creates a review request

workItemTypes.name: User Needs
workItemTypes.description: Represents a detail user need of the system.

workItemTypes.name: Meeting Minutes
workItemTypes.description: This work item tracks minutes of meeting

workItemTypes.name: Milestone
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track major milestones throughout a project lifecycle

workItemTypes.name: Review
workItemTypes.description: This work item tracks reviews and the results.

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the work to resolve the bug and to verify its resolution - TFS2013 Support added

workItemTypes.name: Issue
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Hazard
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the work to mitigate a risk.

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Change Request
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle - TFS2012 Support added

workItemTypes.name: Design Review Request
workItemTypes.description: Create a design review request

workItemTypes.name: Test Suite
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activites for a specific feature, requirement, or user story.

workItemTypes.name: Request
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the Requests.

workItemTypes.name: Release
workItemTypes.description: Track Release Information for related work items - TFS2012 Support added

workItemTypes.name: User Story
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the User Stories.

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the task through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Specification
workItemTypes.description: Includes relevant information to generate a Software Specification Report

workItemTypes.name: Requirement
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the Requirement

workItemTypes.name: Test Plan
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activities for a specific milestone or release.

workItemTypes.name: Production Issue
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the work to resolve Production Issue and to verify its resolution
